::Autofire::

Autofire walks off toward the infermary, his hand slipping into a 
compartment and making sure a certain chip was present and ready to 
be implanted. It was.

He reaches the infermery and walks in, waiting for Megatron.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron looks back from the screen, this was more important. "Very 
well
> Autofire. Go down to the infermery, I'll be right there." He then 
walks
> away from Autofire, and back outside. "Scourge, I need your 
assistance" he
> barks.
> 
> Motormaster arrives at the CR chamber. He puts Wildrider in, and 
pushes the
> activation button. He then climbs into one himself, and presses the 
switch,
> and can slowly feel himself fall into stasis lock, as the fluid 
surounds
> him.
